entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then flurries at times heavy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
